verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees<s%> for <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%> <S%H518>Except<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> they <S%H5998>labor<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%> that <S%H1129>build<s%> it: <S%H3808>except<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> the <S%H8104>watchman<s%> <S%H8245>wakes<s%> but in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>

It is <S%H7723>vain<s%> for you to <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H7925>early,<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> up <S%H309>late,<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6089>sorrows:<s%> for <S%H3651>so<s%> he <S%H5414>gives<s%> his <S%H3039>beloved<s%> <S%H8142>sleep.<s%>
<S%H2009>See,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> are an <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H990>womb<s%> is his <S%H7939>reward.<s%>
As <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man; <S%H3651>so<s%> are <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

<S%H835>Happy<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> that has his <S%H827>quiver<s%> <S%H4390>full<s%> of them: they shall not be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> but they shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> with the <S%H341>enemies<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>
